1.title: The Broadcast
1.plot: Tom spend the night in the party, the next day he arrives tired, is not concentrated and late to the broadcast of studio of children channel. On account of the fatigue happen him a great deal of malfunctions in the broadcast including a demolition of special installation with accumulators that there was supposed to represent Israel in the competition " young innovators " abroad! Is it correct completion exited from this is clean??? Is it correct they will obtain all the accumulators?? Is it correct that tom understood that night before this broadcast is holy???

2.title: Surprise Party
2.plot: Moran, fan of Tom, arrange him the party of surprise in honor of his birthday. When tom arrives to the party he truly is surprised- To the bad, and enters the panic!! No one comes! What to do?? Luck that to cohen - his agent, there is a brilliant head and he brings a solution that only complicate tom even more.

3.title: The Law of the Jungle
3.plot: Tom receives opportunity of once in a lifetime - to lead the campaign of the company "fox"! Cohen, his agent resist because he already closure him musical with Hanoch Rosen - the man is forbidden to tell him " not " differently he can erase you. Tom doesn't excited from this, he is nullifying hanoch Rosen and wants the campaign but after several " malfunctions " strange and frightful that happen him, he returns in him, does the musical with hanoch and even surprises with other campaign, that Cohen settled him.

4.title: Own Goal
4.plot: A gate picture of tal mussari in the magazine "pnai plus" upon tom jealousy. tom explains to cohen, his agent, that he needs an upgrading of career fast, and now!! In the fateful meeting in the office of production "virsberg" remaining tom with one central program: in order to receive a gate picture in the magazine "pnai plus" he will convene to the production with Yael Goldman in order to try to capture a dust of stars. String of events that happen him bring to his advertising in the magazine but not as a pillowcase

5.title: Mouse of the City and the Idiot of the Village
5.plot: Rami, tom's cousin " lands " upon him surprisingly from Eilat, settler him in the apartment and searches to do a fast career in the television.Tom don't like it, Specialiy when he has an important audition to the soap opera on his head...In spite that tom tries to be restrained host, the duality between them does not work and the detonation does not tarry to come, Rami leaves the apartment in anger. Completion that thought that is solved from Rami finds him instead of the most unexpected

6.title: 'Shanti' Tom
6.plot: Hanukah Holiday arrives and with him the musicals. Tom that didn't miss participation in musical from this 11 year decides that this year instead of this he will dedicate itself to the music and his "songs". cohen, his agent, boiling upon him - musical is tradition! by the support of Tamima, the spiritual new guru of Tom, he confronts with Cohen only in order to detect that sometimes the people that they're easy to fight with, they actually the most important

7.title: Hero to the Day
7.plot: Tom complicates. He only wanted to help the someone to lower a cat from the tree but the cat escape. Tom accused in the abuse in the animals and the story only catches an acceleration is intumescent in the newspapers and on the internet to the dimensions that even the big boss of general manager Noga communication, was compelled to interfere. This time apparently that Tom will need to pay the price

8.title: Sink in the Lake
8.plot: Tom flew to Eilat to take decreed time and to do a soul searching, and this time he must to be straight on himself, differently he will not be able to return and to be instructor in the children channel. When he arrives to the hotel in Eilat he discovers that also Agam Rodberg, his old love, situated in Eilat. Tom and Agam meet, raise memoirs, does an impression that there is more between them...And maybe not??

9.title: Bonus: The Truth of Tom Avni
9.plot: Tom talks in excitement how they made the series, how there were the auditions, rehearsals , the photographs, the missed things, all the secrets and the Segments that were censored and that will not show elsewhere.
